item.title: Hope - Journal
item.description: This is accompanied with Hope This is to maintain a daily journal of the efforts. This is to be seen from bottom to top. To explain the jargons: cw: current weight gw: goal weight Ok, lets start. February 23, 2021 cw: 76.15 pulls: 0 A good day. 6 kms walk in two sets. Why? I met a friend on the way and talked to him for a while. Other than that increased the glasses of water I drink in a day by 1, need to hold onto that.
